amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used to carry out section 105(a)(4) and (5) of the Aviation and Transportation Security Act of 2001 that allows the Federal Air Marshal Service to fly for free.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to insert the following (and conform the table of contents of the bill accordingly): SEC. 509. None of the funds made available under this Act may be used to carry out section 105(a)(4) and (5) of the Aviation and Transportation Security Act of 2001 (49 U.S.C. 44917(a)(4) and (5)).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe amendment (A013) Failed by voice vote.
